thread.title: The Internet's Powerful Response to Trump's Alleged Insistence That His Female Staffers "Dress Like Women"

author: Maggie Maloney
title: The Internet's Powerful Response to Trump's Alleged Insistence That His Female Staffers "Dress Like Women"
text:
The Internet's Powerful Response to Trump's Alleged Insistence That His Female Staffers "Dress Like Women" 
This is what it means to #DressLikeAWoman. Most Popular By Maggie Maloney Feb 3, 2017 It was recently revealed that President Donald Trump reportedly prefers his employees to stick to a specific dress code—including the request for his female employees to "dress like women...even if you're in jeans, you need to look neat and orderly." We know how the Trump women dress, but the internet clapped back to show how other women across the country—doctors, soldiers, and even astronauts—actually dress. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below It's worth noting that Trump also has a specific dress code for men, which includes being sharply dressed, wearing solid colors, and having well-groomed hair. Which basically means look professional—not quite as offensive as "dress like women." Because WTF DOES THAT EVEN MEAN?! Here's a look at some of the best tweets that show President Trump what it means to #DressLikeAWoman. #DressLikeAWoman with 23 Grand Slams to your name ☺️ pic.twitter.com/nc4TI84CkS 
— Are We There Yet? (@KBCanB) February 3, 2017 Most Popular 
— Judy Melinek M.D. (@drjudymelinek) February 3, 2017 The President's new dress code says females should #DressLikeAWoman Here is a good example. pic.twitter.com/vF7uhMXmsb 
— Santry Wichita (@WuShocks) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Jenn R-J (@jennfel) February 3, 2017 Sally Ride knew how to #DressLikeAWoman pic.twitter.com/foi46vU5AZ 
— MGL (@mgl_8) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below #dresslikeawoman Katharine Hepburn when harangued about not wearing a skirt: "I’ll wear it to your funeral.” pic.twitter.com/8yz2UvCtX3 
— Dubhthaigh Adams (@lizduffyadams) February 3, 2017 Most Popular MPA graduation, master's in biochemistry, and a bachelor's in materials engineering. #DressLikeAWoman = being the smart ones in the room. pic.twitter.com/9KpgrrHgsy
